sentences.en: All you have to do is right-click on the desktop and select New Folder.
sentences.cn: 你只要在桌面上点击鼠标右键，选择“新建文件夹”就行了。

sentences.en: Can't create the default folder shortcuts for the Navigation Pane.
sentences.cn: 无法为“导航窗格”创建默认文件夹快捷方式.

sentences.en: Conscious of the bulging red folder, Nim told her, " Ask if it's important. "
sentences.cn: 尼姆想到那个鼓鼓囊囊的红色文件夹便告诉她: “ 问问是不是重要的事. ”

sentences.en: Even the dissimilar nesting of folder - inside - drawer - inside - cabinet rarely exceeds two levels of nesting.
sentences.cn: 即使是抽屉内的文件夹 —— 这种不同的嵌套也很少超过两个嵌套层次.

sentences.en: Folder Id Determines which folder a message is filed to.
sentences.cn: 文件夹编号确定哪个文件夹中的邮件存档.

sentences.en: He returned the identical stamped folder to Clyde.
sentences.cn: 他把打过印的那一份又递给克莱德.

sentences.en: He shuffled the advertising proofs together and returned them to the folder they had arrived in.
sentences.cn: 他把那几则广告样张叠好,塞回到文件袋里.

sentences.en: He touched the manila folder which Wainwright had put down.
sentences.cn: 他按了按温赖特放下的马尼拉纸文件袋.

sentences.en: I rummaged through the drawers and came up with Amanda's folder. "Here we are."
sentences.cn: 我翻遍了抽屉，找出了阿曼达的文件夹。“找到了。”

sentences.en: Right - click the ServicePackFiles folder and select the Properties command.
sentences.cn: 右击ServicePackFiles文件夹,选择属性命令.

sentences.en: The folder was sandwiched in between the two bulging files in the drawer.
sentences.cn: 这硬纸卡被挤在抽屉里的两个鼓鼓的档案夹里了.

sentences.en: The folder was two inches thick.
sentences.cn: 那个文件夹有两英寸厚。

sentences.en: There are stationery folder and Hotel Directory in the drawer.
sentences.cn: 抽屉里有文件夹和酒店指南.

sentences.en: You must specify a folder with full pathname or choose Cancel.
sentences.cn: 必须指定文件夹的全名或选择“取消”.

sentences.en: You should see the OpenOffice. org icon in the Applications folder.
sentences.cn: 您应该在应用程序文件夹里看到OpenOffice. org图标.

words.tran_cn: [轻]文件夹；折叠机；折叠式印刷品

trans.tran_cn: 文件夹，折叠机，折叠式印刷品
trans.tran_en: a container for keeping loose papers in, made of folded card or plastic
